SEARCH
Package gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.operations

Interface OperationRequestContext

public interface OperationRequestContext
This class represents an abstraction of some of the methods on the RequestContext interface which will work for both normal API requests and Composite API sub-requests.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.slf4j.Logger
    getLogger()
    Returns the REST request logger
    String
    getPathInfo()
    Returns the URI the request was made to
    <T> T
    getProperty(@NotNull String property)
    Retrieves the value of the given property, if any, set by a previous call during this sub-request to the putProperty method
    <T> T
    getQueryParameterValue(String queryParameter)
    Returns the deserialized value of the named query parameter, if any
    String
    getQueryString()
    Returns the logical query string associated with the request
    List<String>
    getRawQueryParameterValues(String queryParameter)
     
    Set<LanguageType>
    getRequestedLocalizations()
    Returns the set of LanguageType typecodes corresponding to any localizations requested via the 'includeLocalizations' request parameter.
    String
    getRequestMethod()
    Returns the HTTP method for the request
    <T> void
    putProperty(@NotNull String property, T value)
    Stores the given key/value pair for the duration of the current sub-request

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the value
      Parameters:
      property - the name of a property
      value - the value of a property

    • getProperty

      <T> T getProperty(@NotNull @NotNull String property)

    • getLogger

      org.slf4j.Logger getLogger()
      Returns the REST request logger

    • getRequestedLocalizations

      Set<LanguageType> getRequestedLocalizations()
      Returns the set of LanguageType typecodes corresponding to any localizations requested via the 'includeLocalizations' request parameter. If any invalid codes are present in the parameter a BadInputException will be thrown
